post.title: Chief Operating Officer (COO)
post.location: พระโขนง, กรุงเทพฯ
post.brief: Lead global operations, optimize asset performance, and drive strategic initiatives for sustainable growth.
post.description: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced **Chief Operating Officer (COO)** to join our dynamic team. The successful candidate will be responsible for overseeing daily operations. Lead global operations, optimize asset performance, and drive strategic initiatives for sustainable growth.
